main event: Four circular unidentified objects were observed in the sky in Grand Rapids, Michigan, with a sighting duration of approximately 3-1/2 minutes.
interesting points: The objects were described as resembling fluorescent footballs and were pale white and dull, almost grey luminous in color., The objects were at an altitude of about 2,000 feet and moved in an erratic flight pattern., Witnesses reported that the objects could hover, then increase speed suddenly., The objects disappeared possibly behind a house or hill., The sighting was officially reported to the Associated Press and police.
witness description: The witnesses described the objects as glowing and similar in size to a regular football.
